<title level="1" right="Rules">[Weapon Traits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2202)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Weapons and unarmed attacks can have these traits. Weapons crafted and used by a given ancestry (such as the elven curve blade) often have the trait for that ancestry.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
